Divine Love.quote: Even after all this time, the sun never says to the earth, 'You owe me.' Look what happens with a love like that – it lights the whole sky. (Divan)

Spiritual Wine.quote: Wine is the wise teacher, the revealer of secrets. Look in the mirror of wine to see the face of truth. (Divan)

Mystic Vision.quote: I wish I could show you when you are lonely or in darkness the astonishing light of your own being. (Divan)

Heart Wisdom.quote: The heart is the thousand-stringed instrument that can only be tuned with Love. (Divan)

Divine Grace.quote: This place where you are right now, God circled on a map for you. (Divan)

Poetic Beauty.quote: Stay close to anything that makes you glad you are alive. (Divan)

Spiritual Journey.quote: The morning breeze has secrets to tell you. Do not go back to sleep. (Divan)

Love's Mystery.quote: There are different wells within your heart. Some fill with each good rain, others are far too deep for that. (Divan)

Divine Presence.quote: I am a hole in a flute that the Christ's breath moves through – listen to this music. (Divan)

Sacred Intoxication.quote: Bring wine, for I am suffering crop sickness from the vintage; God has seized me, and I am thus held fast. (Divan)

Mystical Knowledge.quote: The great secret which all learned men know is this: no leaf ever falls without the silent consent of the whole tree. (Divan)

Spiritual Freedom.quote: I have learned so much from God that I can no longer call myself a Christian, a Hindu, a Muslim, a Buddhist, a Jew. (Divan)

Poetry's Power.quote: A poet is someone who can pour light into a cup, then raise it to nourish your beautiful parched holy mouth. (Divan)

Divine Beauty.quote: How did the rose ever open its heart and give to this world all its beauty? It felt the encouragement of light against its being. (Divan)

Inner Truth.quote: The subject tonight is Love and for tomorrow night as well. As a matter of fact, I know of no better topic for us to discuss until we all die! (Divan)

Spiritual Practice.quote: The Earth would die if the sun stopped kissing her. (Divan)

Mystic Dance.quote: Every child has known God, not the God of names, not the God of don'ts, but the God who only knows four words and keeps repeating them, saying: Come dance with Me. (Divan)

Heart's Journey.quote: Your heart and my heart are very, very old friends. (Divan)

Divine Union.quote: I am so small I can barely be seen. How can this great love be inside me? Look at your eyes. They are small, but they see enormous things. (Divan)

Poetic Wisdom.quote: Now is the time to know that all that you do is sacred. (Divan)

Spiritual Light.quote: Fear is the cheapest room in the house. I would like to see you living in better conditions. (Divan)

Love's Teaching.quote: This is the kind of Friend you are - Without making me realize my soul's anguish, you slip into my house at night and while I am sleeping, you silently carry off all my suffering and sordid past in your beautiful hands. (Divan)

Divine Mirror.quote: We have come into this exquisite world to experience ever and ever more deeply our divine courage, freedom, and light. (Divan)

Sacred Voice.quote: What we speak becomes the house we live in. (Divan)

Mystical Love.quote: When all your desires are distilled, you will cast just two votes: To love more, and be happy. (Divan)

Soul's Purpose.quote: There is a candle in your heart, ready to be kindled. There is a void in your soul, ready to be filled. (Divan)

Divine Companionship.quote: Don't surrender your loneliness so quickly. Let it cut more deep. Let it ferment and season you as few human or even divine ingredients can. (Divan)

Poetic Truth.quote: The words you speak become the house you live in. (Divan)

Spiritual Awakening.quote: You have been walking the ocean's edge, holding up your robes to keep them dry. You must dive naked under and deeper under, a thousand times deeper. (Divan)

Heart's Wisdom.quote: The beauty of the heart is the lasting beauty: its lips give to drink of the water of life. (Divan)
